overview: New lovers Monique and Alex are moving in together. When Alex goes out drinking with the boys for one last night, he proudly shows them a cell phone pic of his new love. One friend goes silent, and Alex realizes that he and Monique had been sexually involved in the past! This ensues one pig's tale after another...all leading to the realization that each man's girl has been with each man's buddy at one time or another. You'll watch in horror and humor as all the stories intertwine in this tale of nasty sex in random places, with not so random people. Moral of the story: your girlfriend has a past...so just get past it already!
title: Damaged Goods
